title: League of Legends - How to set hotkey mapping for default ctrl-click e.g...

embed.description: My google search and search on our site not helpful so I ask here. I accidentally set Ctrl - left click to another function and since then, I cannot print on-screen info e.g. print frame rate to c...

body:
My [google search](https://www.google.com/search?newwindow=1&q=league%20of%20legends%20how%20to%20set%20hotkey%20mapping%20for%20default%20ctrl-click%20e.g.%20print%20frame%20rate%20to%20chat%20screen&oq=league%20of%20legends%20how%20to%20set%20hotkey%20mapping%20for%20default%20ctrl-click%20e.g.%20print%20frame%20rate%20to%20chat%20screen&gs_l=psy-ab.3...482751.521067.0.521338.87.70.1.0.0.0.1661.9935.0j27j11j2j1j8-1.42.0....0...1.1.64.psy-ab..44.13.2576...0j35i39k1j0i20k1j0i22i30k1j33i22i29i30k1j33i21k1j33i160k1.AW7dRVUVHyI) and [search on our site](https://gaming.stackexchange.com/search?q=league%20of%20legends%20how%20to%20set%20hotkey%20mapping%20for%20default%20ctrl-click%20e.g.%20print%20frame%20rate%20to%20chat%20screen) not helpful so I ask here. I also [asked on stackexchange site](https://gaming.stackexchange.com/q/317226/3385)

I accidentally set `Ctrl - left click` to another function and since then, I cannot print on-screen info e.g. print frame rate to chat screen.

I look in the hotkey mapping menu but find nowhere to set hotkey for that.
As you may know how to set it, please share. 

Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey there,

It seems Jutschge over on stackexchange has [provided you with the correct answer](https://gaming.stackexchange.com/a/317238) to solve your issue, has this worked?
